backgroundInformationList.description: Declaration of Surplus Property - 1785 Finch Avenue West

noticeDescription:
Notice

 

NOTICE is hereby given that in accordance with the City of Toronto’s real estate disposal By-law, on December 9, 2024, portion of the property municipally known as 1785 Finch Avenue West, comprising an area of approximately 746.1 m2 (8,031 ft2) and generally shown as Part 3 on a draft plan of survey titled Project No. 22-B7980 prepared by Mario Group Inc. dated January 24, 2023 , being part  of PIN 10253-0805 (LT), City of Toronto was declared surplus.

 

The City proposes that the intended manner of disposal is to be by way of a long-term ground lease in favour of Community Music Schools of Toronto to construct and operate a non-profit music school.

 

The following City official has information about the proposed disposition: Mr. Akhilesh Tekchand, Project Manager, Real Estate Services, Tel: 416-648-7061, Metro Hall, 55 John Street, 2nd floor, Toronto, Ontario M5V 3C6. Enquiries may be made of the said official until January 9, 2025.
title: Declaration of Surplus Property - 1785 Finch Avenue West
topics: Sale of City Property/Real Estate > Proposed sale of City property
